description: Erection of single storey side extension
decision_conditions: The proposed roof form upon side extension by way of its design and positioning would represent a prominent and incongruous development which would detract from the character and appearance of the site and the surrounding area. It is therefore considered contrary to Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston Upon Thames Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012), and the Council's Supplementary SPD Residential Design Guidance (2013).

The proposed side extension together with the existing single storey side extension by virtue of their size, scale and positioning would represent a dominant development which would detract from the character and scale of the main dwellinghouse and the surrounding area. It is therefore considered contrary to Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston Upon Thames Local Development Framework Core Strategy (2012), and the Council's Supplementary SPD Residential Design Guidance (2013).

The details submitted for Conditions 3 (Facing Materials/Means of Enclosure), 7 (Cycle Parking) and 11 (CO2 Emissions) of Planning Permission ref 19/03147/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and these conditions are hereby fully approved.
Please be advised that a fee of Â£250 is required for this application. This can be paid either online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002
